means: 遗骨，遗体，残骸，残余，遗迹
废墟，遗址，遗迹，剩余（物），余额
留下( remain 的第三人称单数)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"剩余部分"之意。
means: remainder ： 含义较广，可指数学运算中的余数，也指从整体取走或用掉部分后的所余部分，或一群人走掉一部分剩下的人。
surplus ： 指超过需要数量之外的剩余。
rest ： 最普通用词与定冠词连用，指任何指定数量的人或物等。
remains ： 常指人或动物死后的遗体或遗骨，也指古代文明的遗迹或去世作家尚未发表的遗稿。
balance ： 指支取存款的余额或减去各种开支后的尾数。

sentence.Network_en: The economy remains deep in recession with few signs of a pick-up.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济仍深陷衰退之中，几乎没有好转的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: He remains the anchor of the country's fragile political balance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他仍然是维系该国脆弱的政治平衡的支柱。

sentence.Network_en: He wiped off the remains of the lather with a towel.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用毛巾抹去余下的皂沫。

推荐几首英... ... my brain 这幻影在我脑海里种下了根 Still remains 萦绕不去 Within the sound of silence 与于寂静无声的此刻.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (occasionally treated as singular): from Old French remain, from remaindre, from an informal form of Latin remanere (see remain)

entry.def: If someone or something remains in a particular state or condition, they stay in that state or condition and do not change.
If you remain in a place, you stay there and do not move away.

example.ex: He will have to remain in hospital for at least 10 days...
example.tran: 他至少得在医院里呆10天。

example.ex: From time to time, James remained at home with his family.
example.tran: 詹姆斯偶尔留在家里陪家人。

entry.def: You can say that something remains when it still exists.

example.ex: Many of the differences in everyday life remain...
example.tran: 日常生活中的许多差异仍然存在。
更普遍的问题仍未解决。

entry.def: If something remains to be done, it has not yet been done and still needs to be done.

example.ex: Major questions remain to be answered about his work...
example.tran: 关于他工作的许多重要问题仍然悬而未决。

example.ex: Huge amounts of weapons remain to be collected.
example.tran: 大量的武器仍有待收缴。

entry.def: The remains of something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed.

example.ex: They were tidying up the remains of their picnic.
example.tran: 他们正在收拾野餐后剩下的东西。

entry.def: The remains of a person or animal are the parts of their body that are left after they have died, sometimes after they have been dead for a long time.

example.ex: The unrecognizable remains of a man had been found...
example.tran: 一具无法辨认的男性尸体被发现了。

example.ex: More human remains have been unearthed in the north of the country.
example.tran: 在该国北部挖出了更多的人类遗骨。

entry.def: Historical remains are things that have been found from an earlier period of history, usually buried in the ground, for example parts of buildings and pieces of pottery.

example.ex: There are Roman remains all around us.
example.tran: 我们周围都是古罗马的遗迹。

entry.tran: （事实、问题等)仍然是(表示强调)
entry.def: You can use remain in expressions such as the fact remains that or the question remains whether to introduce and emphasize something that you want to talk about.

example.ex: The fact remains that inflation is unacceptably high...
example.tran: 事实是通货膨胀率仍高得离谱。

example.ex: The question remains whether he was fully aware of the claims.
example.tran: 问题是他是否完全意识到了这些要求。

entry.def: If you say that it remains to be seen whether something will happen, you mean that nobody knows whether it will happen.

example.ex: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
example.tran: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

means.word_mean: 1. any object that is left unused or still extant;

sentences.sentence: "I threw out the remains of my dinner"

means.word_mean: 2. the dead body of a human being

auth_sentence.content: Whether we develop a rivalry remains to be seen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whether we develop a rivalry remains to be seen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whether we develop a rivalry remains to be seen.

auth_sentence.content: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Funding for social care remains the most divisive issue.

auth_sentence.content: It remains the album on which their reputation rests.
auth_sentence.res_content: It remains the album on which their reputation rests.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It remains the album on which their reputation rests.

Sentence.sentence: And so the old technology remains as a backup.
Whether digitally interactive ones like Inkling actually take off or not remains to be seen, and we probably won't have a definite answer for the next few years.
According to the author, whether digital textbooks will catch on still remains to be seen
But the consumer sentiment index remains weak, and all the rebound has occurred in Americans' evaluation of future economic conditions, not the present.
However, a further increase in farming area without impacting unfavourably on what remains of the world's natural ecosystems appears unlikely
If the time for heel-dragging has been shortened, the true source of the anxiety and panic remains what it has always been.

jushi.english: The general's remains are buried at high mountains.
jushi.chinese: 那位将军的遗体埋葬在高山上。

jushi.english: The martyr's remains are buried at the foot of the hill.
jushi.chinese: 烈士的遗体葬在山脚下。

jushi.english: The museum contains the remains of Chinese antiquity.
jushi.chinese: 博物馆藏有中国古代的遗物。
